home.hero-sub: Everything you need to know about me

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a Computer Science Master's student with a focus on game development. I love coding and trying out new technologies. I love games and designing games. I love learning and sharing. My tech stack includes Unity3D, Unreal, C#, C++, Python, MERN Stack, etc.
